org.garret.perst
Interface Blob

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, ILoadable, IPersistent, IResource, IStoreable, java.io.Serializable
public interface Blob
extends IPersistent, IResource

Interface to store/fetch large binary objects

getInputStream

RandomAccessInputStream getInputStream(int flags)
Get input stream. InputStream.availabe method can be used to get BLOB size

Parameters:

Returns:
input stream with BLOB data

getOutputStream

RandomAccessOutputStream getOutputStream(boolean multisession)
Get output stream to append data to the BLOB.

Parameters:
multisession - whether BLOB allows further appends of data or closing this output streat means that BLOB will not be changed any more.
Returns:
output srteam

getOutputStream

RandomAccessOutputStream getOutputStream(int flags)
Get output stream to append data to the BLOB.

Parameters:
flags - bit mask of BLOB flags: ENABLE_SEGMENT_CACHING, DOUBLE_SEGMENT_SIZE, TRUNCATE_LAST_SEGMENT, APPEND
Returns:
output srteam

getOutputStream

RandomAccessOutputStream getOutputStream(long position,
                                         boolean multisession)
Get output stream with specified current postion in BLOB.

Parameters:
position - current position in BLOB, if less than zero, than data will be appended to the BLOB
multisession - whether BLOB allows further appends of data or closing this output streat means that BLOB will not be changed any more.
Returns:
output srteam
